unnormalised: The tech world buzzed yesterday with the announcement of Ms. Priya Sharma’s promotion to Chief Technology Officer (CTO) at InnovTech Solutions, Gurgaon. Sharma, previously VP of Engineering, steps into the role following Mr. Rakesh Kumar’s retirement after 20 yrs with the company. The official announcement came at 10:00 AM during a press conference held at the InnovTech headquarters.
normalised: The tech world buzzed yesterday with the announcement of Miss Priya Sharma’s promotion to C-T-O at InnovTech Solutions, Gurgaon. Sharma, previously V-P of Engineering, steps into the role following Mister Rakesh Kumar’s retirement after twenty years with the company. The official announcement came at ten A-M during a press conference held at the InnovTech headquarters.

unnormalised: Industry analysts are keenly watching Sharma’s next moves. Her track record includes spearheading the successful launch of their flagship product, 'ConnectX,' last year, a venture which saw a 30% increase in market share. Sources within InnovTech indicate that Sharma will likely focus on expanding the company's AI capabilities and exploring new markets in Southeast Asia, aiming for a Rs. 500 crore revenue jump within the next financial yr.
normalised: Industry analysts are keenly watching Sharma’s next moves. Her track record includes spearheading the successful launch of their flagship product, 'ConnectX,' last year, a venture which saw a thirty percent increase in market share. Sources within InnovTech indicate that Sharma will likely focus on expanding the company's A-I capabilities and exploring new markets in Southeast Asia, aiming for a rupee five hundred crore revenue jump within the next financial year.

unnormalised: “Ms. Sharma's vision and leadership are precisely what InnovTech needs as we navigate the rapidly evolving tech landscape," stated Mr. Anil Patel, CEO of InnovTech, in a released statement. Sharma herself expressed enthusiasm, promising to build upon the foundations laid by her predecessor and drive InnovTech towards greater innovation and global recognition. The transition takes effect immediately, with an official onboarding ceremony scheduled for 01/07/2024.
normalised: “Miss Sharma's vision and leadership are precisely what InnovTech needs as we navigate the rapidly evolving tech landscape," stated Mister Anil Patel, C-E-O of InnovTech, in a released statement. Sharma herself expressed enthusiasm, promising to build upon the foundations laid by her predecessor and drive InnovTech towards greater innovation and global recognition. The transition takes effect immediately, with an official onboarding ceremony scheduled for first July two thousand and twenty four.
